TopicTitle: You Know You're A Nerd When:

Articles.Content:
When you browse the KSP forums and NSF forums instead of Facebook/Twitter/Instagram/9GAG when you're bored.

Edited May 21, 2017 by TheEpicSquared
When think that Reddit is an amateur helpdesk of main KSP forum.

when you have to do a social PSA but instead do something about space

and ROCK IT!!

(he he...geddit?)
When the only game you play regularly is KSP.
When you never launch KSP because you play KSP in your mind.

You play ksp

Edited March 28, 2020 by SpaceEnthusiast23
When for your final history presentation about something entertaining, you do model rocketry.
When you know how a neuron fires.
When, while relaxing on a hammock, you listen to the kinetic energy of the swing slowly dissipating into the trees and air.

When you stay up till ~3 am every other morning for astrophotography.

Edited June 6, 2017 by munlander1
Stop, wait... You go to bed before 4 am?...

16 minutes ago, kerbiloid said:

Stop, wait... You go to bed before 4 am?...

Saturday it was closer to 5:30

-When you can tell where in the ISS an astronaut's video is after watching a 50 minute tour

-When you watched that 50 minute tour of the ISS in the first place

Really, it speaks for itself. 

                   * TNHToo (67320b53@gateway/web/cgi-irc/kiwiirc.com/ip.xxx.xx.xx) has joined
                   * ChanServ gives voice to TNHToo
          <TNHToo> o/
    <narwhalz0111> o/
<TotallyNotHuman_> o/
          <TNHToo> I'm just going to idle here in case TotallyNotHuman_ lags out.
<TotallyNotHuman_> Hush, you.
    <narwhalz0111> 'kay
          <TNHToo> no u
<TotallyNotHuman_> Hey, don't you talk to me like that.
<TotallyNotHuman_> I'm the one with op.
                   * ChanServ gives channel operator status to TNHToo
          <TNHToo> Oh yeah?
<TotallyNotHuman_> ...frak.
        >ChanServ< deop #kerbaeadastra TNHToo
          <TNHToo> Wth, narwhalz0111?
          <TNHToo> :(
                   * TNHToo is sad now.
                   * narwhalz0111 whistles innocently.
          <TNHToo> 14:26:03[ChanServ]You have been deopped on #kerbaeadastra by narwhalz0111
          <TNHToo> How do you explain that?
    <narwhalz0111> ONESCORE MADE ME DO IT!
    <narwhalz0111_> Who, me?
    <narwhalz0111_> Nah, man.
                   * narwhalz0111 is betrayed.
<TotallyNotHuman_> Note to self: upload this convo to You Know You're A Nerd When... thread.
                   * TNHToo likes publicity.
    <narwhalz0111> Titled:
<TotallyNotHuman_> Problems of a Schizophrenic
    <narwhalz0111> "The Hazards of Sympathetic Schizophrenia"
          <TNHToo> Sorry, TotallyNotHuman_, but I like narwhalz0111 's title better.
<TotallyNotHuman_> D:
                   * TotallyNotHuman_ is betrayed.

You know you've got no life when one of the only things you do in your spare time is calculus and stuff of that nature...

 

HEY!

You know you use ... too much when most of your posts end with that...

Edited June 11, 2017 by Astrofox
When you understand that HEY abbreviation in the previous post means High-Energy Yield, and you both use this exclamation to express your emotions..
When you facepalmed every time you see spacecraft in movie banks for turning

When you are sitting in the back of the class doing nothing because the four other kids are taking finals. 

I have almost 1 1/2 hours left, and Reddit is blocked.

Another gem from the IRC channel @0111narwhalz and I maintain: 

== TNHToo [67ea8f4a@gateway/web/freenode/ip.not.tel.lin.you] has joined #kerbaeadastra
== mode/#kerbaeadastra [+v TNHToo] by ChanServ
<+TNHToo> o/
<+BenjaminK> o/
<+narwhalz0111__> o/
* TNHToo was forced to go to library by math teacher.
<+BenjaminK> and why library?
<+TNHToo> BenjaminK: Student reflection.
<+TNHToo> Also, the reflection sheet is in Comic Sans.
* TNHToo ducks and runs.
<+narwhalz0111__> :o
* narwhalz0111__ 's brain bleeds.
* TNHToo has aneurysm.
* narwhalz0111__ 's eyeballs liquifact.
* TNHToo 's grey matter separates from his white matter.
* narwhalz0111__ rm *
* TNHToo forkbomb
* narwhalz0111__ BSODs.
* TNHToo
* TNHToo kernel panics.
* narwhalz0111__ begins bootlooping.
* TNHToo installs VMBootloaderTrap.dll.
* narwhalz0111__ 's cooling fans overspin and fly apart.
* TNHToo 's heatsink melts.
* narwhalz0111__ ruptures heat pipes.
* TNHToo 's capacitors blow.
* narwhalz0111__ boils solder.
* TNHToo melts silicon.
* narwhalz0111__ burns hole through bed and into floor.
* TNHToo burns through crust.
* narwhalz0111__ collapses to singularity and falls through planet.
* TNHToo burrows through planet and into star.
<+narwhalz0111__> whut.
<+TNHToo> Propelled by Comic Sans, of course.
<+TNHToo> :x
* narwhalz0111__ devours star into strangelet.
<+TNHToo> ...okay, we need to post this /me chain into the "You Know You're A Nerd When..." thread.
<+narwhalz0111__> :D
<+narwhalz0111__> I'll let you do the honors.

Several things have been trimmed (irrelevant things in the channel and IP addresses for anonymity) from the chatlog.
When you've spent the entire day in your chair playing KSP.
... instead if doing your homework.
When you don't understand the logic of a person who reads all the way through an airplane flight instead of looking out the window.
Maybe he reads a cloud atlas.

2 hours ago, kerbiloid said:

Maybe he reads a cloud atlas.

It was a romantic drama.  Oh well, that doesn't stop me from watching as I'm flying!

Just now, cubinator said:

It was a romantic drama

No... I mean - a meteorologist's reference. To understand what clouds he can see outside.
